Class Expression

java.lang.Object
simuletta.compiler.SyntaxClass
simuletta.compiler.expression.Expression
Direct Known Subclasses:
BinaryOperation, Designator, DSizeExpression, ExpressionList, IfExpression, QuaOperation, UnaryOperation, Value
public class Expression extends SyntaxClass
Expression. 
Syntax:

expression
        ::= factor
        ::= unary_operator factor
        ::= expression binary_operator factor
        ::= if Boolean'expression then expression else expression
        ::= type_conversion

        factor
                ::= value
                ::= variable
                ::= routine_activation
                ::= ( expression )

                unary_operator ::= + | - | not

        binary_operator
                ::= + | - | * | / | rem
                ::= and | or | xor
                ::= invalid input: '<'> | invalid input: '<' | invalid input: '<'= | = | >= | > *
Author:
